text: midneunjadeul-iyeo sal-in-ui gyeong-u jayuin dae jayuin jongbog dae jongbog yeoseong dae yeoseong-eulo dongdeunghan cheobeolgyu jeong-i gilogdoeeo issnola geuleona pi haejaui hyeongjelobuteo yongseoleul bad-eun janeun gamsaui bosang-eul haeya doenani bohojaneun gyeyul-eul ttaleun geos-ila i geos-eun neohoe junim-eulobuteo gamhyeong-gwa jabiloda geuhu beomhaeng-eul beobhanjaneun gotongseuleoun jingbeol-i geuege iss-eul geos-ila
